name: Agent Shadow
description:
Right click to move. Left click to shoot. Collect all 5 items shown in mini map to clear wave and start new wave. Score based on items collected. Enemies have friendly fire on. Collect items without shooting if you are up for a challenge.

If You turn white, you DIE. Press Esc FOR Main menu.

Credits-

Development Contributor - Gaurav Tripathi(https://itch.io/profile/the1337est)

Voice over pack by Kenney

Background music by Rauld Strauss
